title: Remove Admin button from the site header

requirements.text: Remove the "Admin" control/button from the site header on both desktop and mobile views so it is no longer visible to any user (including admins), while keeping all other header content and behavior unchanged.

quotes: Just remove the "Admin" button from the header. Rest keep everything as it is

acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as an admin on the home route, the header does not display any "Admin" button/control on desktop.
When logged in as an admin on the home route, the mobile sheet menu does not display any "Admin" button/control.
All other existing header actions remain unchanged: navigation links, Contact Us dropdown, My Bookings button, My Profile control, Login/Logout behavior.
No backend changes are required; the /admin/notifications route and existing access control remain intact.

constraints: Do not modify any backend (Motoko) code or state schema for this change.
Do not change any other header UI elements, layout, routes, or authentication logic beyond removing the Admin control from the header.
nonGoals: Removing or changing the existing Admin Notifications page (/admin/notifications).
Removing the Admin Panel link in the footer or otherwise changing admin access control.
